name: James R Gainfort Consulting Architects Reviews

review.title: “Good place to delve into architectural details & technical issues in a comprehensive way.”
review.pros: Pros – Good place to advance knowledge of building envelope and work on interesting projects.
review.cons: Cons – Small office with limited resources and personalities. Principal is busy and does not provide employee reviews.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Have regular reviews so as to give employees feedback about their competence and future at the firm.
